name: northeast
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 the direction that is between north and east: We live in the northeast of Spain. the Northeast
the area in the northeast of England, the US, or another country: Newcastle is one of the largest cities in the Northeast.
More examplesFewer examplesWintry conditions are making roads hazardous for drivers in the northeast of England.I've lived in the northeast all my life.The sign is pointing towards the northeast.The company is based in the northeast.The rain will be heaviest in the northeast.

B1 in or towards the northeast: Go northeast for about five miles. The town is/lies roughly northeast of here. the northeast corner of the field northeast wind
